ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty

Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.liberty.LightLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    functionProvider

    public class LightLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements functionProvider
    This class perform the light localization and places the robot at the point (0,0).

        public void turnTo(double theta,
                   boolean fallThrough)
        This method determines at which angle the robot should go to. It should do so with a MINIMAL angle.
        Parameters:
        theta - if positive then the robot will turn to the right, else it will rotate the the left
        fallThrough -
